projects.name: JobHunt- an Online Job Portal
projects.description: JobHunt is a dynamic platform built with the MERN stack, enabling students to seamlessly apply for jobs while recruiters post new opportunities. With Multer integration, users can easily upload resumes, ensuring a smooth and efficient job search experience. Users can personalize their job search by filtering opportunities based on city, role, and salary.

projects.name: Study Notion- an Online Education Platform
projects.description: StudyNotion is a fully functional ed-tech platform that enables users to create, consume, and rate educational content. Supports Payment Mechanism Using RazorPay Integration and OTP Verification. The platform is built using the MERN stack which includes ReactJS, NodeJS, MongoDB, and ExpressJS.

projects.name: SHEMA- an Online Shopping Website
projects.description: An innovative online shopping platform built with the MERN stack, offering a seamless and intuitive user experience. Enjoy a vast product selection, secure transactions, and fast delivery, all powered by MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

experiences.description: Learned Data Analytics Tools in Python, made Presentations for Data Analysis.
